title: Silver versing Platinum?
body:
Today in a ranked game with one of my mates (both silver) we were matched against a platinum Vayne. I thought this was impossible considering I can't ranked queue with my plat friend, so why are 4 silver and 1 gold versing 2 silvers, 2 golds and a platinum??? 
Check op.gg

replies.body:
Usually this kind of thing happens when the Silvers are winning a lot and gaining MMR faster than rank, and the Plats are doing the opposite, which appears to be the case (at least with the Plat Zyra game if that's the one you mean).

Basically what the system sees is that all of your team had a higher MMR than the average and the Plat on the enemy team had lower MMR than average for their rank, thus making the MMR and theoretically the skill about equal, just not the actual ranks.

It's also worth pointing out that the Zyra didn't actually do all that well that game. Rather it was the Aatrox and the Kha who are S2 and S1 respectively that seemed to pull the most weight, which seems to further emphasise the downward spiral that Plat player is in.
